price: 3. Es realmente detestable para Al-lah que digáis lo que no hacéis.
arabic: كَبُرَ مَقۡتًا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَن تَقُولُواْ مَا لَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kabura maqtan ʿinda al-lahi an taqūlū mā lā tafʿalūna
